EmailTemplate.name: Advocate Email Reply Deny
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation notification for ({Case.Name})
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hello {!Advocate}, Claim submitted on behalf of {!Claimant} against {!Defendant} on {!filed date} is to be DENIED based on the {!Claimant} response. We have closed the pending case and there will be no further action by the Labor Commissionerâ€™s office. If you have any questions or concerns about your decision, please call us at 833-LCO-INFO (833-526-4636) Labor Commissioner's Office
